physical_appearance: Valentijin's portrait is framed with an oval rim in the center of the image, and it is surrounded by six individuals that gaze upon his face. At the bottom of the print is is a caption in latin.
sgcool_label_text: Francois Valentijn was a minister, naturalist and writer who devoted much of his life in serving the Dutch V.O.C., having spent a significant tenure from 1685 to 1714 in the East Indies. His monumental work Oud en Nieuw Oost-Indien (Old and New East-India), published between 1724 and 1726, offered a comprehensive mapping of Southeast Asia, and a large selection of scale maps and views of the East Indies.
subject_terms_2: Valentijn, Francois, 1666-1727 Portraits Engraving  Prints Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie  East Indies  Naturalist  Authors
